This module implements steps.

Imports

Types

Step = object
  case kind*: StepKind
  of PairPlace:
    pair*: Pair
    placement*: Placement
  of NuisanceDrop:
    counts*: array[Col, int]
    hard*: bool
  of FieldRotate:
    cross*: bool
Game step. Source   Edit   
StepKind {.pure.} = enum
  PairPlace, NuisanceDrop, FieldRotate
Discriminator for Step. Source   Edit   
Steps = Deque[Step]
Sequence of steps. Source   Edit
